DOC.HEADLINE: ARMED PATROLS DROPPED AT SNOWMASS SKI RESORT
DOC.TEXT: The Aspen Skiing Co . has decided to discontinue armed patrols of its Snowmass resort.The company said regular police patrols on the mountain , apparently a first for American ski areas , was creating a bad image . The ski company had Snowmass Village police , carrying guns in their fanny packs , patrol the resort four times a week . Patrols began after Thanksgiving . " Unfortunately , the perception has been extremely negative and , the new program has led people to believe that there is a crime problem at Snowmass Ski Area , which simply is not the case , " Police_Chief Art Smythe said Thursday .
